title: Gun Goddess Miss Fortune: Exclusive Border?
body:
I cannot find anywhere, any mention of this skin including an exclusive border.
Yet it does apparently come with one!

https://imgur.com/a/mQmRx

This is remarkably poorly advertised _(in fact I cant find it advertised anywhere)_, and should at** LEAST** show a border listed as included within the bundle in the purchase screen. The lunar skins clearly had borders included in the list of items included in the bundle, when at the purchase screen.

So I'm making this post so anyone _(like myself)_ who did not realise it came with a border _(I'm guessing only in the payback bundle?)_ doesn't miss the chance to get it.

replies.body:
Those borders are horrid.

Give me an option to not use them.

Edit: removed a bad word in case mods are on an abuse spree today.
